> Perhaps a good analogy would be a basketball forward who thinks, "I
> don't really need to work on my dribbling, the guards always bring up
> the ball."

Or (for us Europeans ;) like a goalkeeper thinking "I don't need to
communicate with the defenders, I'll just catch every ball they let
through."

Cheers, Ilja
